p: One serum sample per patient was collected by using Vacuette ® TUBE Serum Separator Clot Activator (Vacuette, Greiner Bio-One, Kremsmünster, Austria). After collection, all the samples were stored at -80°C. All 139 samples were transported to Lima (Peru) under standardized frozen conditions to perform molecular assays. Positive control material for DENV, CHIKV, ZIKV, and MAYV was provided by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC, Fort Collins, CO, USA).
